channel.title: Eudemons Online pserver anyone?
channel.description:
I have been getting a few different databases and client combos and messed around a bit. I can host this for online use via Hamachi but it may lag due to Internet speeds. Before you ask, a database is how the servers run. Without that nothing would work correctly.
No this would not be like other eo pserver that get donations. I would be running a 15 minute maintenance (every night 3am central time) that would give everybody VIP7, etc. The only issue would be that everybody who wants to play would need to message me a user and pass to login with (ouch!).
Tl;dr - would you be interested in playing a eudemons online private server exclusive to moparscape members?

item.title: Eudemons Online pserver anyone?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

ytuio9:

The reason I didn’t just google is because I wanted your opinion on the game and it’s mechanics etc.

My opinion is that it runs good on even some old computers and ive played this since 05 and never lost interest. My opinion is that it is a fun game and private servers have a much more mature playerbase. I can give you all sorts of opinions. The only real flaws that I see is how pet attacks and some user attacks will not work well under high lag. Its because, you press a button, that gets sent to the server along with what pet (or you) are carrying this skill. The server than calculates damage for everything it will hit. All of said data is now sent back to you andthe animation and pet (or player) id that is performing it to everybody else. It seems like a shitload but happens before you even flinch on good internet.

I would suggest asking ‘whats your opinion on the games mechanics’ next time. Not ‘whats eudemons’ as that signifies you were to lazy to even look it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Eudemons Online pserver anyone?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

LilXCj:

Looks interesting.

If you have never played, I suggest playing the legit english game for a little so you know at least the basics. Private servers are being made English from a released Chinese server from a while back. Would seem easy to translate but there’s no “TextHandler.java” I can go to. However I am working on it as time goes lol.

Read full topic
